text: Contempt () is a 1963 French Italian drama movie written and directed by Jean- Luc Godard (who also stars) and based on the 1954 novel Il disprezzo (A Ghost at Noon) by Alberto Moravia. Actors include Brigitte Bardot, Jack Palance, Fritz Lang, Giorgia Moll, Michel Piccoli, Raoul Coutard. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1963 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jean- Luc Godard
title: Contempt (movie)
